title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 397.2 - Application
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 397.2 - Application

State Regulations

Each time an applicant applies for EAA, a separate copy
of the State-prescribed form shall be completed, except that if he last applied
for such assistance within 12 months prior thereto and lives at the same
address, his last previous application shall be reviewed and updated and shall
be signed by the applicant. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
397.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
